# Generating SAM files
## Installing samtools
```
conda create -n samtools
conda activate samtools
conda install samtools

#Check that installation worked
samtools --version
  samtools 1.18
  
```

## Indexing the Transcriptome
Before aligning my RNA-seq data I made sure that the de novo transcriptome assembly was properly indexed using `samtools faidx`. Doing this enables efficient access to arbitrary regions within my reference sequences (the transcriptome assembly).

The index was created as: `samtools faidx trinity_supertran_floridae.fasta`.
